hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EOLS_ID, EO_LTL_STRATEGY.CREATOR, EO_LTL_STRATEGY.CREATE_TIME, EO_LTL_STRATEGY.MODIFIER, EO_LTL_STRATEGY.MODIFY_TIME, EO_LTL_STRATEGY.REC_VER, EO_LTL_STRATEGY.REC_STATUS, EO_LTL_STRATEGY.ORG_ID, EO_LTL_STRATEGY.TIME_ZONE, EO_LTL_STRATEGY.PM_CODE, EO_LTL_STRATEGY.COMPANY_CODE, EO_LTL_STRATEGY.SITE_CODE, EOLS_NAME, EOLS_NAME_EN, EOLS_REMARK, ESUS.ESUS_USER_NAME_CN AS ESUS_USER_CREATOR_NAME, ESUSM.ESUS_USER_NAME_CN AS ESUS_USER_MODIFIER_NAME, EOLS_PRIORITY FROM EO_LTL_STRATEGY LEFT JOIN ES_USER ESUS ON EO_LTL_STRATEGY.CREATOR = ESUS.ESUS_ID LEFT JOIN ES_USER ESUSM ON EO_LTL_STRATEGY.MODIFIER = ESUSM.ESUS_ID WHERE 1=1 <<AND EO_LTL_STRATEGY.REC_STATUS = :recStatus>> <<AND EO_LTL_STRATEGY.ORG_ID = :orgId>> <<AND EO_LTL_STRATEGY.TIME_ZONE = :timeZone>> <<AND EO_LTL_STRATEGY.PM_CODE = :pmCode>> <<AND EO_LTL_STRATEGY.COMPANY_CODE = :companyCode>> <<AND EO_LTL_STRATEGY.SITE_CODE = :siteCode>> <<AND EOLS_NAME LIKE :eolsName>> <<AND EOLS_NAME_EN LIKE :eolsNameEn>> <<AND EOLS_REMARK = :eolsRemark>> <<AND EOLS_PRIORITY = :eolsPriority>> order by EOLS_PRIORITY asc
